_meanings:
<ab>N.</ab> of a
Mantra called {#haMsa#}, which consists of
a number of inhalations and 
exhalations ({#SvAsapraSvAsayoH bahirgamanAgamanAByAM#}
{#akzaranizpAdanarUpo japaH, sa ca haMsaH sohaM#} 
{#ityAkAra eva; ucCvAsEreva niSvAsErhaMsa ityakzaradvayaM .#}
{#tasmAtprARaSca haMsAKya AtmAkAreRa saMsTitaH ..#})
